Caffè Americano

Espresso shots combined with hot water form a delicate layer of crema, resulting in a beautifully rich cup full of depth and complexity.
Pro Tip: For an extra kick, ask your barista to add an extra shot.

Blonde Caffè Americano

Espresso shots combined with hot water create a delicate layer of crema, crafted with our Starbucks® Blonde Roast for an extra-smooth, subtly sweet, and nuanced cup.
Pro Tip: Need an extra boost? Ask your barista to add another shot—each one packs 85 mg of caffeine.

Pike Place® Roast

From our original store in Seattle’s Pike Place Market to coffeehouses around the globe, customers have asked for a freshly brewed coffee to enjoy all day long. In 2008, our master blenders and roasters crafted this perfect blend—a smooth, well-rounded mix of Latin American coffees with hints of chocolate and toasted nuts. It's brewed fresh every day at a Starbucks® store near you.

Decaf Pike Place® Roast

From our first store in Seattle’s Pike Place Market to our coffeehouses around the world, customers requested a freshly brewed coffee they could enjoy throughout the day. In 2008 our master blenders and roasters created this for you—a smooth, well-rounded blend of Latin American coffees with subtly rich flavors of chocolate and toasted nuts, it’s served fresh every day at a Starbucks® store near you. (Decaf as you like it.)
